author: PlayStation
description:
Always be ready to play on a 27"" Gaming Monitor with DualSense® Charging Hook from PlayStation®.
 
The 27"" Gaming Monitor with DualSense® Charging Hook features a QHD screen with HDR visuals*, up to 240 Hz refresh rate* with VRR support* for smooth gameplay, and a convenient DualSense® wireless controller charging hook to keep you ready for action anytime. Bring the PlayStation® experience to your desktop to ensure your gaming space is always ready to play.
 
For more information, visit PlayStation Blog.
 
*Features available with compatible devices and supported games, sold separately. Supports a refresh rate of up to 120 Hz when connected to a PlayStation®5 console. Design and specifications are subject to change without notice.

#ps5 #stateofplay
title: 27" Gaming Monitor with DualSense Charging Hook - Teaser Trailer

■A new take on shooting action and in-depth exploration
Experience a new type of action adventure, featuring a fusion between exploration within an expansive world and highly technical twin-stick shooting. At your home base, power up the demon king Damon and make purchases. During the exploration phase, defeat enemies to complete each area. The story progresses as you alternate between the two phases.
 
■Strategic battles with a vast arsenal of weapons and gimmicks
The battle mechanics include both close-ranged attacks with handguns as well as long-ranged attacks with machine guns and more.
You can find more powerful weapons as you explore. 
During the boss battles awaiting within each stage, a strategic appro
title: Damon and Baby - Teaser Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
[Game Overview]
BlazBlue Entropy Effect X is a roguelite action game where players take control of 14 unique characters from the BLAZBLUE franchise.
Each character possesses distinctive “Potentials,” which can be freely combined with a wide variety of tactical skills to create countless battle styles.
By inheriting abilities between characters, players can develop deeper builds and enjoy limitless character customization tailored to their own playstyle.
 
[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”,a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
To prevent the destruction of the world, the protagonist "Ace" dives into the Sea of Possibility in search of the key known as the "Shards of Possibility".
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
title: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X - ACEX | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Never Grave: The Witch and The Curse launches on March 5, 2026 (Thu)!
 ──Become the cursed hat and descend into the depths of fate.
 A 2D roguelike action game imbued with hand-drawn warmth and quiet beauty.
 
■ Game Overview
Never Grave is a full-scale 2D action game where you wield the power of a cursed hat to slash and cast spells against your foes.
Ruins, botanical gardens, and other dungeons change their shape each time you enter, thanks to procedural generation, offering a new experience with every run.
 
Possess enemies to steal their abilities with the unique Possession System, rebuild a ruined village using gathered materials, and embark on your journey with up to four players in online co-op play.
Wander, choose, overcome—and weave your own story.
 
■ Product Information
Publisher: Pocketpair Publishing
Platform: PlayStation 5 / PlayStation 4
Genre: 2D Roguelike Action
Release Date: March 5, 2026 (Thu)
Players: 1–4 (Online Multiplayer Supported)
Rating: IARC 3+
 
#ps5 #ps5ga
title: Never Grave: The Witch and The Curse - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

In Digimon Story Time Stranger, players journeyed across the human world and the Digital World to save the world from collapse, exploring the bond between humans and Digimon along the way. With 450+ Digimon to collect and train, and strategic turn-based battles, the game offers deep gameplay and emotional storytelling.
 
The first Season Pass DLC, Additional Digimon & Episode Pack 1: Alternate Dimension, has been officially revealed. This DLC introduces new Digivolution routes for Mega Digimon and features a special episode that weaves together encounters across time and space. 

Look out for more updates on the DLC, which is scheduled for release this winter!

author: PlayStation
description:
No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES, a new entry in the AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES series, is coming to PlayStation®5 and PlayStation®4!
 
The player takes on the role of Kaname Date, the protagonist, and once again teams up with the AI-Ball, Aiba, to tackle a mysterious case and rescue Iris, an internet idol who has been forced to take part in a dangerous escape game. No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES introduces a new gameplay element: "Escape". As with previous games, in "Investigation", players will examine crime scenes and listen to testimonies. In "Somnium", players enter the dream worlds of suspects and key witnesses. In the new "Escape" sections, players will solve puzzles to break out locked rooms. By moving between these three sections, players can obtain the necessary clues to solve the case.
 
No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES Story Summary
One day, after The New Cyclops Serial Killings was resolved, internet idol Iris Sa

author: PlayStation
description:
BrokenLore: ASCEND is a first-person psychological horror experience that follows the final, desperate climb of Ren and Yui, two famous Japanese rooftop climbers obsessed with outdoing themselves and feeding their fame.

Their channel, SKYLIMIT, has turned them into icons among fans of illegal urban climbing, leading them to the Elysium Tower, the tallest tower in Japan, for a nighttime ascent meant to become “the ultimate video."
 
But the higher they climb, the more their ascent turns into a nightmare. A supernatural presence, the Rokurokubi, an entity with a serpent-like neck and a face hidden behind an ornate mask, begins to manifest. Yet the true horror lies in what it represents: the embodiment of their deepest fear, the fear of being forgotten, of becoming ordinary again, invisible and irrelevant.
 
For Ren and Yui, falling means more than death. It means obscurity, the end of validation, the loss of the only meaning left in their lives.

ASCEND tells the story of a race upward
title: BrokenLore: Ascend - Official Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/where-winds-meet/

Don't miss the official gameplay trailer for Where Winds Meet, an epic Wuxia open world action-adventure game developed by Everstone Studio. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

Where Winds Meet will be available on November 14(PT) for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

Wishlist and pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #WhereWindsMeeet #WWM

Brace yourself for a relentless alien assault in Let Them Come: Onslaught — a bullet heaven roguelike where retro sci-fi chaos meets modern carnage.

Launches November 11, 2025 on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.

👉 Buy & play today:
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014090

Each run pushes your skills to the limit as you craft the ultimate build from an arsenal of over-the-top weapons, explosive upgrades, and devastating abilities. Shred endless alien hordes in spectacular cinematic mayhem, powered by a pulsing Cartridge 1987 soundtrack.

If you love Survivors-likes, action roguelikes, or the adrenaline rush of classic ’80s sci-fi action movies, Let Them Come: Onslaught delivers the ultimate power fantasy.

🎮 Features

Fast-paced bullet heaven combat
Deep build variety with crazy weapon combos
Synthwave soundtrack
Retro-futuristic art and cinematic mayhem
Endless replayability
